title: JSON schema for myver configuration files

group.description: Holds the definition of a section of the version. This section will contain the configuration of one or many version parts.

prefix.description: The prefix string for the group of version parts.

parts.description: The collection of part configurations for a group.

part.description: Configuration of a single version part.

requires.description: Defines another part this this part requires. If this value is specified, it means that the part that is required will always be set as long as this part is set.

prefix.description: The prefix string for the part.

identifiers.description: The list of parts explicitly defined as children of this part.

numeric.description: Defines if the part is numeric, which would mean it has no identifiers and it is a number that can be incremented.

start.description: The starting value of a part, when a part is invoked out of a null state and the value of the part is not overridden, the start value is used by default.

value.description: The actual value of a part.

groups.description: The groups of a version, holding one or many version parts.
